title: Chemical induces microstructural transformation of pulp fibre to colloidal cellulose for sustainable plant protection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32001-32007
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06600F, Paper
Open Access

Apichat Phengdaam, Jiranat Chaiyosburana, Wichayut Hianchasri, Nutthaphol Khupsathianwong, Nattapon Uthaipan, Sanong Ekgasit
This work highlights the conversion of pulp fibers into colloidal cellulose through a simple acidic treatment, demonstrating its potential as a sustainable coating agent or adjuvant for enhanced agricultural protection strategies.
